The soules lamentations, and loue to God Preces & lachrymae. Dumps and teares of repentance. B. L., fl. 1614.
[152]+ p.
Printed by Tho: Purfoot, London : An. 1614.
"To the sinner" (leaf A4) signed: B.L. Signatures: A⁴ B-G¹² . Imperfect; all after p. [152] (leaf G12) lacking. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
